ORM

This module includes the asynchronous ORM functionalities for the MySQL subpackage.

class DbUnify.MySQL.aio.ORM.ORMManager.ORMManager(host: str, user: str, password: str, database: str, port: int = 3306, cache_ttl: int = 60)[source]

Bases: Manager

ORMManager Class

The ORMManager class provides methods for managing database schema and interactions using ORM (Object-Relational Mapping) principles. It extends the Manager class and includes functionalities for mapping models, applying migrations, and handling database resources.

cache

An instance of the Cache class for caching query results.

Type:

Cache

Type:

class DbUnify.MySQL.aio.ORM.Field.Field(data_type: str, constraints: List[str | Rules] | None = None)[source]

Bases: object

Base class for all model fields.

exception DbUnify.MySQL.aio.ORM.ORMException.ORMMException(message: str)[source]

Bases: Exception

Base class for all exceptions related to the Manager and ORM system.

Examples

Field and Model Definition

Define fields and models using the ORM functionalities.

import asyncio
from DbUnify.MySQL.aio.ORM import ORMManager, Model, Field
from DbUnify.MySQL.data import Rules, DataType

class User(Model):
    id = Field(DataType.INTEGER, constraints=[Rules.PRIMARY_KEY, Rules.AUTOINCREMENT])
    name = Field(DataType.TEXT, constraints=[Rules.NOT_NULL])
    email = Field(DataType.TEXT, constraints=[Rules.UNIQUE])

async def main():
    orm_manager = ORMManager(host='localhost', user='user', password='password', database='example_db')
    await orm_manager.connect()
    User.set_manager(orm_manager)
    await User.create_table()
    await orm_manager.close()

asyncio.run(main())

Create Table

Create a table using the ORM functionalities.

import asyncio
from DbUnify.MySQL.aio.ORM import ORMManager, Model, Field
from DbUnify.MySQL.data import Rules, DataType

class User(Model):
    id = Field(DataType.INTEGER, constraints=[Rules.PRIMARY_KEY, Rules.AUTOINCREMENT])
    name = Field(DataType.TEXT, constraints=[Rules.NOT_NULL])
    email = Field(DataType.TEXT, constraints=[Rules.UNIQUE])

async def main():
    orm_manager = ORMManager(host='localhost', user='user', password='password', database='example_db')
    await orm_manager.connect()
    User.set_manager(orm_manager)
    await User.create_table()
    await orm_manager.close()

asyncio.run(main())

Add Column

Add a Column to table using the ORM functionalities.

import asyncio
from DbUnify.MySQL.aio.ORM import ORMManager, Model, Field
from DbUnify.MySQL.data import Rules, DataType

class User(Model):
    id = Field(DataType.INTEGER, constraints=[Rules.PRIMARY_KEY, Rules.AUTOINCREMENT])
    name = Field(DataType.TEXT, constraints=[Rules.NOT_NULL])
    email = Field(DataType.TEXT, constraints=[Rules.UNIQUE])

async def main():
    orm_manager = ORMManager(host='localhost', user='user', password='password', database='example_db')
    await orm_manager.connect()
    User.set_manager(orm_manager)
    await User.add_column(
        column_name='age',
        data_type=DataType.VARCHAR(255),
        constraints=Rules.NOT_NULL
    )
    await orm_manager.close()

asyncio.run(main())

Delete Column

Delete a Column to table using the ORM functionalities.

import asyncio
from DbUnify.MySQL.aio.ORM import ORMManager, Model, Field
from DbUnify.MySQL.data import Rules, DataType

class User(Model):
    id = Field(DataType.INTEGER, constraints=[Rules.PRIMARY_KEY, Rules.AUTOINCREMENT])
    name = Field(DataType.TEXT, constraints=[Rules.NOT_NULL])
    email = Field(DataType.TEXT, constraints=[Rules.UNIQUE])

async def main():
    orm_manager = ORMManager(host='localhost', user='user', password='password', database='example_db')
    await orm_manager.connect()
    User.set_manager(orm_manager)
    await User.delete_column('age')
    await orm_manager.close()

asyncio.run(main())

Insert Row

Insert a row into a table.

import asyncio
from DbUnify.MySQL.aio.ORM import ORMManager, Model, Field
from DbUnify.MySQL.data import Rules, DataType

class User(Model):
    id = Field(DataType.INTEGER, constraints=[Rules.PRIMARY_KEY, Rules.AUTOINCREMENT])
    name = Field(DataType.TEXT, constraints=[Rules.NOT_NULL])
    email = Field(DataType.TEXT, constraints=[Rules.UNIQUE])

async def main():
    orm_manager = ORMManager(host='localhost', user='user', password='password', database='example_db')
    await orm_manager.connect()
    User.set_manager(orm_manager)
    await User.create_table()
    await User.insert_row(values={'name': 'John Doe', 'email': 'john@example.com'})
    await orm_manager.close()

asyncio.run(main())

Select Rows

Select rows from a table.

import asyncio
from DbUnify.MySQL.aio.ORM import ORMManager, Model, Field
from DbUnify.MySQL.data import Rules, DataType

class User(Model):
    id = Field(DataType.INTEGER, constraints=[Rules.PRIMARY_KEY, Rules.AUTOINCREMENT])
    name = Field(DataType.TEXT, constraints=[Rules.NOT_NULL])
    email = Field(DataType.TEXT, constraints=[Rules.UNIQUE])

async def main():
    orm_manager = ORMManager(host='localhost', user='user', password='password', database='example_db')
    await orm_manager.connect()
    User.set_manager(orm_manager)
    await User.create_table()
    users = await User.select()
    print("Users:", users)
    await orm_manager.close()

asyncio.run(main())

Select one row

Select one row from a table.

import asyncio
from DbUnify.MySQL.aio.ORM import ORMManager, Model, Field
from DbUnify.MySQL.data import Rules, DataType

class User(Model):
    id = Field(DataType.INTEGER, constraints=[Rules.PRIMARY_KEY, Rules.AUTOINCREMENT])
    name = Field(DataType.TEXT, constraints=[Rules.NOT_NULL])
    email = Field(DataType.TEXT, constraints=[Rules.UNIQUE])

async def main():
    orm_manager = ORMManager(host='localhost', user='user', password='password', database='example_db')
    await orm_manager.connect()
    User.set_manager(orm_manager)
    await User.create_table()
    user = await User.select_one(name='John Doe')
    print("Users:", users)
    await orm_manager.close()

asyncio.run(main())

Update Row

Update a row in the table.

import asyncio
from DbUnify.MySQL.aio.ORM import ORMManager, Model, Field
from DbUnify.MySQL.data import Rules, DataType

class User(Model):
    id = Field(DataType.INTEGER, constraints=[Rules.PRIMARY_KEY, Rules.AUTOINCREMENT])
    name = Field(DataType.TEXT, constraints=[Rules.NOT_NULL])
    email = Field(DataType.TEXT, constraints=[Rules.UNIQUE])

async def main():
    orm_manager = ORMManager(host='localhost', user='user', password='password', database='example_db')
    await orm_manager.connect()
    User.set_manager(orm_manager)
    await User.create_table()
    await User.update_row(condition='name = "John Doe"', age='30')
    await orm_manager.close()

asyncio.run(main())

Delete Row

Delete a row from the table.

import asyncio
from DbUnify.MySQL.aio.ORM import ORMManager, Model, Field
from DbUnify.MySQL.data import Rules, DataType

class User(Model):
    id = Field(DataType.INTEGER, constraints=[Rules.PRIMARY_KEY, Rules.AUTOINCREMENT])
    name = Field(DataType.TEXT, constraints=[Rules.NOT_NULL])
    email = Field(DataType.TEXT, constraints=[Rules.UNIQUE])

async def main():
    orm_manager = ORMManager(host='localhost', user='user', password='password', database='example_db')
    await orm_manager.connect()
    User.set_manager(orm_manager)
    await User.create_table()
    await User.delete_row(name='John Doe')
    await orm_manager.close()

asyncio.run(main())

Drop Table

Drop a table from the database.

import asyncio
from DbUnify.MySQL.aio.ORM import ORMManager, Model, Field
from DbUnify.MySQL.data import Rules, DataType

class User(Model):
    id = Field(DataType.INTEGER, constraints=[Rules.PRIMARY_KEY, Rules.AUTOINCREMENT])
    name = Field(DataType.TEXT, constraints=[Rules.NOT_NULL])
    email = Field(DataType.TEXT, constraints=[Rules.UNIQUE])

async def main():
    orm_manager = ORMManager(host='localhost', user='user', password='password', database='example_db')
    await orm_manager.connect()
    User.set_manager(orm_manager)
    await User.create_table()
    await User.drop_table()
    await orm_manager.close()

asyncio.run(main())
